transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Shoaib sir, good evening. I am Sneha speaking. Sir, I spoke to you in the afternoon. You were saying.
Customer: Haan, main aapko main do teen din mein karta hu, main busy nahi hu, ghar mein shadi hai.
Executive: Sir, are you busy right now? Can you tell me a time, a day, I will call then. But you have to take out time.
Customer: Main aapko karta hu aapko 10 ya 11 tarikh ko, ghar mein shadi hai.
Executive: 10, 11. Okay sir, please.
Customer: Theek hai sir, aap kar lijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to schedule a call with the customer.

- Customer says he is busy due to a wedding.



Resolution:

- Customer will be available on the 10th or 11th.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer on the 10th or 11th.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- follow up, call scheduling
